plugin.name: ðŸ’¶ï¸ Expenses
plugin.description: Plugin to track your expenses for further analyis
plugin.author: @m1well

plugin.commands.name: expensesTracking
plugin.commands.description: Provides multiple possibilities to track your expenses

plugin.commands.name: expensesAggregate
plugin.commands.description: Aggregates the tracked expenses of the chosen year to a new expenses aggregated note

plugin.settings.title: Use new plugin settings?
plugin.settings.description:
This is just a feature flag - let it at false to still
use _configuration file or set it to true if you want to use the settings from here

plugin.settings.title: Path of folder where the expenses notes are stored
plugin.settings.description:
Set the path where you want to store the notes
-> just an example folderPath, please adapt to your needs

plugin.settings.title: Delimiter of note columns
plugin.settings.description: Choose the preferred delimiter for your note

plugin.settings.title: Custom date format for the date column
plugin.settings.description:
Choose custom date format for the date column
- e.g. one date '2021-12-08'
So the format should be like 'yyyy-MM-dd' or 'yyyy-MM'
ATTENTION: don't use your chosen delimiter here

plugin.settings.title: Format for the amount column
plugin.settings.description:
Choose 'full' to have always 2 fraction digits with localized separator
or 'short' to have only rounded numbers without digits

plugin.settings.title: Order of all columns (comma separated)
plugin.settings.description:
Choose order for all columns
- please do that before the first tracking!

plugin.settings.title: Categories for the expenses (comma separated)
plugin.settings.description:
These are only example categories
- please adapt to your needs!!

plugin.settings.title: Shortcut expenses (JSON format)
plugin.settings.description: Shortcut expenses with given category - you can also add an amount, then you can insert the shortcut without any question

plugin.settings.title: Fixed expenses (JSON format)
plugin.settings.description: Fixed expenses with given category and amount for e.g. monthly expenses or 'once a year' expenses
